option1.name: stringsToClaim
option1.label: Evidence contains strings
option1.description: A string or list of stings separated by '|' that will be claimed if it is the only evidence discovered. For example: foo | bar | foobar

option2.name: isSearchTermClaimable
option2.label: Claim files with search term evidence? (True/False)
option2.description:
True - Claim file if there is search terms evidence in file.
False - Do Not claim file if there is search terms evidence in file.

option3.name: takeAction
option3.label: Mark as reviewed and assign files to inventory (True/False)
option3.description:
True - Mark files as reviewed and assign to inventory.
False - Only report on the actions that would be taken if true.

option4.name: inventoryItemForClaimedFiles
option4.label: Inventory item to assign claimed files to.
option4.description: All files that are claimed will be marked as reviewed and assigned to this inventory item if the above open is True.
